diaz.title: No fear, just fastballs
diaz.description: Edwin Diaz shows he is not scared of the big moments, whether it's closing for the Mariners or his native Puerto Rico

mechanics.title: The whip, the deceit, the heat: How Edwin Diaz hits triple digits
mechanics.description: With his arms acting 'like a whip,' Edwin Diaz harnesses the power to throw a baseball really, really fast.

science.title: Don't blink: The science of a 100-mph fastball
science.description: Here's a look at the complex nature of baseball's most primal interaction between 'man with rock' and 'man with stick.'

trends.title: Here's how the 100-mph fastball became the 'slam dunk of baseball'
trends.description: More pitchers are eclipsing triple digits with their fastballs than ever before, and they're getting paid more to boot. So what gives?

closers.title: Closing time: Can Edwin Diaz end Mariners' fans justified end-of-game jitters?
closers.description: The Mariners' closing role has been the antithesis of stability over the years. Is Edwin Diaz the answer to Seattle's closing woes?
